resources.string: Look at those cute puppies! How adorable :D
He is the one of the smartest dog species in the world!
I wonder how she could get that cuteness…!
In 5 years, he will be a great partner of police.
Oh my god, I got stuck into their cute face!
She has a powerful physical health -can run 250km per day!-
Have you ever imagine what will happen if maltese falls in love with poodle..? The heart-attack!!
Oh… Well… Calm down for whatever he make in happen…
